General.Name: Suryamas Dutamakmur Tbk
General.Description: PT Suryamas Dutamakmur Tbk develops real estate properties in Indonesia. It is involved in the sale of land and houses; and operation of the golf courses, country clubs, hotels, and other resort facilities located in Rancamaya, Bogor, West Java. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Suryamas Dutamakmur Tbk is a subsidiary of Top Global Limited.
General.Address: Sudirman Plaza Business Complex, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12910
